com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics

Class ReadWriteRunnableStandard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics.ReadWriteRunnableStandard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadWriteRunnable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ReadWriteRunnableStandard
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReadWriteRunnable
    Main loop that copies the read/write buffer from/to the device

    Helper class for Modern Robotics USB Device
